page.title: 20MILTON AREA WEATHER RECORDS.
page.content:
In our ecology project we made daily weather recordings at Milton in May 1985,comparing them with those made in autumn 1984.Cirrus{clouds}were most common in autumn and stratus ones in May.15 days{sun}in autumn compared with 5 in May,but from the 29th of May it was a heatwave.{Air pressure}in autumn ranged from 29.2 to 29.8,and in May from 29.8 to 30.1.Autumn{winds } were SW or W,while in May cold east winds prevailed until the 22nd.More {rain}fell in autumn than in May,but autumn{temperatures}were higher.
Milton of Balgonie Primary School. Jamie Aitken,Mark Crombie,Scott Herd, Sandra Shearer,Angela Morrison,Colin and Mark Sanaghan,Kirsteen Patrick and Mrs Elizabeth Walker. P6/7. May 1985.
